verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
One thing I desire
Only this I seek
Just to dwell dwell dwell
Here forever

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
This will be my posture
Laying at Your feet
Oh just to dwell dwell dwell
Here forever

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Dearest Father
Closest Friend
Most beautiful
Most beautiful

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
There are no words
There's nothing left
So our love sings to You
Oh oh oh
There are no words
There's nothing left
So our love sings to You
Oh oh oh

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
I'm so in love with You
You're beautiful
So beautiful, oh
I fix my eyes on You
You're beautiful
So beautiful

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
With just one look
Everything changes
I'm captivated
I'll never be the same
